category-def.name: org.eclipse.papyrus.java.generator
category-def.label: Java Generator
category-def.description: Java Classes generator. This feature allows to generate Java classes from Papyrus classes and packages. It also allows to generate projects.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.papyrus.java.profile
category-def.label: Java Profile for classes and project generation
category-def.description: This profile is used by the Java generator and the Java reverse to add additional properties to the UML model. These properties allows to change the names, specify project target, source targets, ...

category-def.name: org.eclipse.papyrus.java
category-def.label: Java Tools For Papyrus
category-def.description: Tools related to the Java language. This set of plugins allows to reverse java code to a Papyrus model, and to generate Java code from a Papyrus model.
